charges.charge_description: INTERFERENCE WITH COMMERCE BY THREAT OR VIOLENCE(1ss)

charges.charge_disposition: Imprisonment: 240 months on counts (S4)1 &; (S4)2, 120 months on count (S4)4, and 120 months on count (S4)5, the foregoing terms to run concurrently; a term of imprisonment of life on count 3, the term to run consecutively to the sentence on counts (S4)1, (S4)2, (S4)4, and (S4)5; and a term of life imprisonment on count (S4)6, the term to run consecutively to the sentences on counts (S4)1 through (S4)5. Supervised Release: 5 Years.
